skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: steins gate facts
des:
In the visual novel, there are 11 time-travel theories mentioned by Kurisu that are accepted in the scientific world. In Steins;Gate, the theory used is the Black Hole Theory. Fun Fact: This is the same theory discussed for time travel in the recent anime, Orange. 
Know some more mind blowing facts.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
